Other Information.Additional Info: ZIF-7 membranes are effective for H2/CO2 separations in precombustion processes.
ZIF-7-S exhibits reversible CO2 adsorption/desorption isotherms at 30-75 째C, while ZIF-7-D and -R show hysteretic behavior.

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: H2/CO2 selectivity: Not Reported, CO2/N2 selectivity: Not Reported

Other Information.Additional Info: The thermal activation process at ~200 째C under air leads to the removal of guest molecules (mainly DMF), resulting in a structural transition to the ZIF-7-I phase. The smallest ZIF-7 particles (~100 nm) exhibit flexible pore structures near their outer surface, favoring reversible CO2 adsorption/desorption.
